entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Tatlayoko Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:38 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tatlayoko Lake 2:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -8.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 42 %
Dewpoint: -19.0°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. Temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Sunny. 60 percent chance of flurries over southern sections early this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear except partly cloudy over southern sections early this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the afternoon. High minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
